name: Fur Arms Armor
description: Fur armor is a sidegrade to Leather Armor , offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.
